uk.ac.open.kmi.iserve.rest.discovery

Interface DiscoveryPlugin

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    OperationDiscoveryPlugin, ServiceDiscoveryPlugin

    public interface DiscoveryPlugin
    Interface that defined the core methods that Discovery Plugins should provide Concrete implementations should implement the ServiceDiscoveryPlugin interface, and/or the OperationDiscoveryPlugin interface.
    Author:
    Dong Liu (Knowledge Media Institute - The Open University), Carlos Pedrinaci (Knowledge Media Institute - The Open University)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getDescription()
      Obtains the description of the plugin
      String getFeedTitle() 
      String getName()
      Obtain the name of the plugin
      Map<String,String> getParametersDetails()
      Obtains information about the parameters supported by the engine
      String getVersion()
      Obtains the version of the plugin
